message:
Hi Stephen!   
What if I want to do Task.Factory.StartNew inside a threadpool thread already and not a UI application. E.g. a WCF operation. I want to process my incoming requests in separate threads so I start a new task using Task.Factory.Startnew. The advantage I see here is that I pass the state object to my worker methods using StartNew to avoid closures and allocations.

What is your opinion here?
